text: Baby blue is a shade of blue. It is the pastel color of blue. Baby blue is a light tone of azure. The first recorded use of baby blue as a color name in English was in 1892.Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York:1930 McGraw- Hill Page 190; Color Sample of Baby Blue: Page 93 Plate 35 Color Sample E2 ==Meaning of baby blue== In Western culture, since the late 19th century, the color baby blue has been associated with baby boys. ==Tones of baby blue color comparison chart== Name Color HEX Code Red Green Blue Hue Sat Lum Source Light Bubbles #F5FFFF 245 255 255 180* 100% 98% Xona.com Color List Bubbles #E7FEFF 231 254 255 183* 100% 95% Xona.com Color List Beau Blue #BCD4E6 182 212 230 246* 46% 82% Plochere Baby Blue #89CFF0 137 207 240 199* 77% 74% www.99color.net Baby Blue Eyes #A1CAF1 161 202 241 209* 74% 79% Plochere Little Boy Blue #6CA0DC 108 160 220 212* 62% 64% Pantone TPX 16-4132 ==Related pages== *List of colors == References ==
